This guide is a simplified overview of all the changes in the {{BE}} 0.4.0, which assumes at least some familiarity with ''Bedrock Edition'' 0.3.x releases.

==Mobs==
===Changed===
{|{{Simple Guide table|Changed Mobs}}
|-
|[[Zombie]]
|[[File:Zombie JE2 BE1.png|128px]]
|Now drop 0-1 feathers with chance 25℅ when upon death.
|-
|[[Creeper]]
|[[File:Creeper JE3 BE1.png|128px]]
|Now can spawn naturally.
|}
